isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CATERPILLAR 3406B -1991 - SYSTEM COMPONENTS AND OPERATION - Kysor Engine Shutdown

svcproc.title: Kysor Engine Shutdown
svcproc.para: On vehicles equipped with the Kysor system, battery voltage to power the ECM (engine electronic control module) is controlled by the Run Relay which is in turn controlled by the Kysor system alarmstat (engine coolant temperature switch) and pressurestat (engine oil pressure switch) and the Kysor Control Module (30-second automatic override).
